# Filters index 
<!-- This file is AUTOGENERATED from docblocks in Codice source. DO NOT modify it directly -->
Note that in case of filters there is always at least one parameter, being content the filter is applied to. This table omits them and lists only additional parameters available through array sent as second argument to the defined callable.
